h1. Shreyas Satish - Blog

Automatically transformed by "Jekyll":http://github.com/mojombo/jekyll into a static site whenever I push this repository to GitHub.

This blog implements "Responsive Web Design":http://www.smashingmagazine.com/2011/01/12/guidelines-for-responsive-web-design/ using the "CSSGrid.net framework.":http://cssgrid.net . I am thankful to Github for hosting this blog free of cost.

h1. License

The following directories and their contents can be considered as Creative Commons. Any content used elsewhere would need to carry a reference.

* _posts/

All other directories and files are MIT Licensed. Feel free to use the HTML and CSS as you please. If you do use them, a link back to http://github.com/shreyas-satish/ would be appreciated.
